title: Large-Scale Mobile Learning-Based Business Language Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic job-related language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment linking mobile devices with offline classrooms, providing practical language application scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can apply over 80% of real-time business field data collected through a mobile learning platform to language learning.
Learners systematically classify and share job-related language resources via a knowledge management system, achieving over 90% participation in team projects.
Learners can improve business language expression skills by 40% compared to pre-assessment through mobile-based missions (field interviews, meeting minutes, etc.).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
